name: Brave Rascals
description:
Classic retro platformer game that will bring you back to your childhood!
Brave Rascals!!!

Do you like Games?
Are you good at Games?
Do you want a real game?
For those who wants a game that feels like "THIS is a GAME!"

* Features
- Glamorous heroes
- Tons of stages
- Big boss fight
- Tricky traps
- Becomes very difficult when you pursue the perfect games
- Giving up collecting stars will make it easier, if you want

Explore the legendary world looking for the key and the door riding Shopping cart, Balloon and a Witch's broom!
Hilarious stages will keep coming!
